name: django-docs
title: Django Docs
description: Navigate and search through Django documentation
author: JensAstrup

commands.name: search-documentation
commands.title: Search Documentation
commands.description: Searches through the latest version's documentation

commands.name: refresh-docs
commands.title: Refresh Django Docs Cache
commands.description: Background job to refresh cached documentation

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
